I didn't see any rules about it and I saw other introductions so... Here I am.

I'm Vasili, I joined after I Googled "creating a text-based adventure game" and found this, downloaded Quest, And created a short test game.
Anyway! I'll be here a lot more so get used to it! I promise to stay off the grass.
